 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂלָו‎</span> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Exod.16.13|Exod 16:13]]</sup> ==quail== (probably foreign word; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Samaritan <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — ***quail, coturnix communis*** or ***vulguris*** ([[BDB#Tristr|Tristr]]<sup>NHB 229 ff. FFP 124</sup> [[BDB#Post|Post]]<sup>Hast. DB. QUAIL</sup>, [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>[[Exod.16.13|Exod 16:13]]</sup>): — absolute collective [[Num.11.32|Num 11:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.16.13|Exod 16:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ps.105.40|Ps 105:40]] (in all [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂלָיו‎</span>); plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְוִים‎</span> [[Num.11.31|Num 11:31]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; as if from singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְוֶה‎</span>). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְמָא‎</span>, I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְמָה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְמוֺן‎</span>. belowII. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂלְמָה‎</span> = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׂמְלָה‎</span> see below <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׂמל‎</span>.
